        Constructor for the Elliptic curve key pair generator factory.

        keyTypeName - the name of the key type associated with this key pair generator factory

    • Method Detail

      • getKeyPairGenerator

        public KeyPairGenerator getKeyPairGenerator​(Provider provider)
                                     throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                            KeyException
        Creates a key pair generator.
        Parameters:
        provider - the crypto provider used to create the key pair generator
        Returns:
        a KeyPairGenerator
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - the key type served by this factory instance is not supported by the specified provider
        KeyException - error initiating the key pair generator
